Summary: I'm being visited by aliens almost every night now.
divs: Sighting DetailsIve seen ufos about 4 different times now, they were v shape,I have been visited by aliens since i was 5 years old,they told me this,I wake up in the mornings with black eyes, bloody lip,puncture wounds in both ears with blood coming out,i have several implants in both ears,this has been happening for years and is happening more and more,i also have scares that are v shaped and triangle shaped that i keep waking up with,it goes on and on,i have dreams almost every night about aliens,this has been happening my whole life,it happens so much that i keep a journal,there is also like a plasma ball effect going on in my room every night,i think that is how they have 24 hour access to me,all these strange little things keep happening to me,i use to think that i was crazy,but now i know that it is the aliens.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gastonia
There were no other sightings in Gastonia on or around June 8th 2010
